title: Events Hub
text:

Events Hub













Events Hub
Connecting you to PMNCH network's events around women's, children's and adolescents' health and well-being












Upcoming events










International Women’s Day: A Call to Action


                        8 – 7 March 2025
                    











World Water Day 2025: Glacier Preservation and Health


                        22 – 21 March 2025
                    











150th IPU Assembly


                        5 – 9 April 2025
                    







Event highlight








April 9th
Sexual and Reproductive Health and Rights as Catalyst for Social and Economic Rights: Advancing Health, Equity and Development

 




Share your events with us!








Submit your event to our Events Hub

 





Calendar of events


Use the commands below to filter events by type, health topic and regional/country focus.Click on an event title once to see a summary of the event and double click to open the event’s page for more details and related resources.
















Health topics



Regions/Countries

















Browse events by focus area

Maternal, newborn and child health

 











Sexual and reproductive health and rights

                        26 – 28 March 2025

                        25 – 27 March 2025

                        10 – 21 March 2025
